text: Erling Sven Lorentzen (28 January 1923 – 9 March 2021)Erling Lorentzen, brother-in-law to King Harald of Norway, dies at the age of 98 – Royal Central was a Norwegian-Brazilian shipowner and businessman. He founded Aracruz Celulose in 1968. He was the widower of Princess Ragnhild, the eldest child of King Olav V of Norway. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2021 deaths Category:People from Oslo Category:Norwegian businesspeople Category:Brazilian businesspeople
title: Erling Lorentzen
